inclusion.criterion: Presence of HBsAg positivity for more than 6 months that indicated chronic HBV infection;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HBV viral load more than 20000 IU/mL in HBeAg positive or more than 2000 IU/mL in HBeAg Negative CHB patients;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Presence of liver injury which was defined as histology activity index (HAI) >3 by Knodell necroinflammantion scoring system or liver fibrosis stage 2 or stage 3 by Metavir scoring system;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Liver histology available for evaluation 6 months before starting screening is also acceptable. This criteria is limited to subjects enrolling TAF treatment group.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ALT level between 1-2 folds of ULN for at least one occasion in recent 1 year before screening;
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other etiology of chronic hepatitis; Those patients with spontaneous clearance of HCV defined as presence of anti-HCV antibody but undetectable of HCV RNA at least 3 months before enrollment and without history of anti-viral treatment could be included.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current evidence or suspicious of malignancy;
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic HBV infection, liver injury and is treatment naïve.
